Courtside.Description: Elite seating offering the closest view of the action, providing an immersive game day experience.
Courtside.View_Quality: Direct view at court level, offering the most engaging and dynamic experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Opportunities for direct interactions with players, visibility on live broadcasts.
Courtside.Accessibility: Priority access with some limitations for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to VIP clubs, complimentary gourmet dining, and personalized services.

Club Level.Description: Premium seating offering a fantastic view of the game from an elevated perspective, with added benefits.
Club Level.View_Quality: Elevated and central views ensuring a perfect sightline to the court.
Club Level.Unique_Features: Comfortable seating with additional legroom, less crowded for a more exclusive experience.
Club Level.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, with nearby elevators and restrooms.
Club Level.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive lounges, gourmet dining options, and in-seat service.

Upper Level.Description: A budget-friendly option that offers a bird's-eye view of the game, capturing the entire court.
Upper Level.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the court, ideal for fans who appreciate the game from a higher vantage point.
Upper Level.Unique_Features: An affordable way to enjoy the excitement of Pistons basketball.
Upper Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, with escalators and elevators to the upper levels.
Upper Level.Special_Perks: Cost-effective, with access to standard arena amenities.

Suite Level.Description: Luxurious private suites offering a blend of exclusivity and comfort with a premier view of the game.
Suite Level.View_Quality: Private and elevated viewing experience with unmatched sightlines to the court.
Suite Level.Unique_Features: Suites equipped with plush seating, private restrooms, and customizable catering options.
Suite Level.Accessibility: Exclusive access points with private elevators, ensuring ease of movement.
Suite Level.Special_Perks: Personalized service, access to exclusive clubs, and priority booking for events.

restaurants_bars.name: Mikes Pizza Bar
restaurants_bars.description: Artisanal pizza place offering a sports bar environment, located within walking distance to Little Caesars Arena.

restaurants_bars.name: Sports & Social Detroit
restaurants_bars.description: A dynamic sports bar offering a wide range of games, live music, and a high-energy atmosphere near the arena.

restaurants_bars.name: Kid Rocks Made in Detroit
restaurants_bars.description: A restaurant and bar featuring a menu inspired by Kid Rockâ€™s Detroit roots, located inside Little Caesars Arena.

restaurants_bars.name: The District Market
restaurants_bars.description: A marketplace offering a variety of local flavors and specialties, located inside Little Caesars Arena.

restaurants_bars.name: Iron Hill Brewery & Restaurant
restaurants_bars.description: Craft brewery and restaurant offering a diverse menu and house-made beers, a short drive from downtown Detroit.

restaurants_bars.name: HopCat
restaurants_bars.description: Known for its extensive selection of craft beers and unique food items like 'Crack Fries,' HopCat is a favorite among locals.

accommodations.name: The Siren Hotel
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel offering unique, artistically inspired rooms in the heart of downtown Detroit.

accommodations.name: Aloft Detroit at The David Whitney
accommodations.description: Modern hotel with spacious rooms, located in a historic building close to Little Caesars Arena.

accommodations.name: Shinola Hotel
accommodations.description: Luxury hotel offering a blend of classic and modern design, featuring amenities such as a fitness center and on-site dining.

accommodations.name: Detroit Foundation Hotel
accommodations.description: Set in the former Detroit Fire Department Headquarters, this hotel combines historical charm with contemporary luxury.

accommodations.name: The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit
accommodations.description: Historic luxury hotel that has been restored to its original grandeur, featuring upscale rooms and suites with city views.

accommodations.name: Element Detroit at the Metropolitan
accommodations.description: Eco-friendly hotel in a renovated neo-Gothic building, offering modern design and healthy living options.

tourist_attractions.name: Detroit Institute of Arts
tourist_attractions.description: One of the largest and most significant art collections in the United States, located in Midtown Detroit.

tourist_attractions.name: The Henry Ford Museum
tourist_attractions.description: A large indoor and outdoor history museum complex and a National Historic Landmark in the Detroit suburb of Dearborn.

tourist_attractions.name: Belle Isle Park
tourist_attractions.description: A 982-acre island park in the Detroit River, featuring a zoo, greenhouse, maritime museum, and stunning views of the city skyline.

tourist_attractions.name: Motown Museum
tourist_attractions.description: Historic museum located in the original headquarters of Motown Records, showcasing the history and impact of the Motown record label.

tourist_attractions.name: Detroit Riverwalk
tourist_attractions.description: A scenic 5.5-mile long path along the Detroit River, offering access to parks, restaurants, and beautiful city views.

tourist_attractions.name: Comerica Park
tourist_attractions.description: Home of the Detroit Tigers, this ballpark offers not just baseball games but also a carousel, a Ferris wheel, and a museum.

team_related_activities.name: Pistons Locker Room Store
team_related_activities.description: Official store for Detroit Pistons merchandise, offering a wide selection of gear for fans.

team_related_activities.name: Little Caesars Arena Tours
team_related_activities.description: Guided tours of the Pistons' home arena, offering fans a behind-the-scenes look at the state-of-the-art facility.

team_related_activities.name: Pistons Game Day Experience
team_related_activities.description: A pre-game fan zone featuring interactive games, live entertainment, and opportunities to meet Pistons legends.

options.description: The QLine streetcar runs along Woodward Avenue, offering convenient access to Little Caesars Arena from various parts of the city.
Detroit's DDOT and SMART bus services provide routes that have stops near Little Caesars Arena, facilitating access from surrounding areas.
The Detroit People Mover is an automated light rail system circling downtown Detroit, with stations close to Little Caesars Arena, making it a convenient option for getting to the game.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Pistons tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Pistons tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: SeatGeek
best_places_to_buy.description: A user-friendly platform that aggregates ticket listings from across the web, providing a wide selection of purchasing options.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
